column5: reaching out to this lake next weekend and was curious if any of you have had any luck fishing smallmouth on this lake.  is it worth my while?
Getting out and wetting a line always is!!!  Tell me how it is and we'll take a trip there soon.
I've fished it once. We did well for bass and caught decent pike too (5-8 lbs)
thanks Rizzo. Yeah Reefer...thats our next trip when were in the area..
